name: Roll of the Dice [GMTK Jam 2022]
description:
Fight fierce enemies as you travel through Malazar's lair. Roll the dice to determine your damage, power up over time, and battle the evil idol himself.

Inspired by Dungeons and Dragons and classic turn-based games.

This roguelike was made during the GMTK Jam 2022. I missed the deadline so I took an extra day to polish and balance the game. Things I would have liked to add:

  • More item status effects
  • Better balancing between magic and physical damage
  • More polish when you reach the final boss
  • More story and lore pieces

Credits:

  • Music by Zeebo Digital
  • Sprites by Atelier Mayo
